---
title: "Gamma-Results-Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rgamma-7-2.RData")
Gamma72 <- gamma72
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Gamma72Call <- stream_in(file("rgamma-7-2-Call-Revised.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
Gamma72Result <- stream_in(file("rgamma-7-2_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Gamma.7.2.OpenAI <- left_join(Gamma72Call,Gamma72Result)
Full.Gamma.7.2 <- left_join(Gamma72$params, Gamma.7.2.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Gamma.7.2.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Gamma.7.2$Outcome <- map_chr(Gamma72$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Gamma72Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Gamma.7.2$Outcome)
```

```{r}
save(Full.Gamma.7.2, file="Full.Gamma.7.2.RData")
```
